title: Are the boards broken?
body: I cannot post links. The loading icon appears after inserting the link it its special box but it never stops loading. And it does not allow me to post the discussion.

replies.body:
Yea it looks like there's something weird going on with links today, typically this kind of issue tends to fix itself after a bit. I'll be sure to poke some people to check into the links for sure. 

I'm a little confused about not being able to post a discussion since you were able to post this one here? I'm gonna go ahead and push a sync through for ya just to be sure everything else is working correctly though!
What I meant by not being able to post a discussion was that if I put a link I am unable to, otherwise as you just said couldn't have posted this one XD
Ayyyyy head's up like I said I would, Image Links should be working now as far as I can tell ^_^

Hah alright yea that threw me off a bit tbh xD! For now, try to avoid posting links so that you can at least get these discussions in. I'd be sure to try again later on in the day to see if it's fixed, and I'll do my best to reply here once I know for sure myself!
